On 10/18/2010 11:03 AM, Youssef Eldakar wrote:
> - The User-Agent URL you provide, <http://www.archive.bibalex.org>, does
> not include information about the purpose of your crawl or how to
> contact the operator when problems arise. (Most webmasters don't log and
> can't see the 'From' value provided, so the URL has to explain what
> webmasters can do to contact you.)
Can you provide an example?

Thanks in advance.

-- 
Mahmoud A. Mubarak
Bibliotheca Alexandrina
